panels.description: Percent of reads on node that are supplied from RAM.  Note, sequential workloads where speculative readahead is effective will be served from RAM and shown here [although disks will also be busy]
panels.title: Reads from RAM

panels.description: Percent of reads on node that are supplied from FlashCache.
panels.title: Reads from Flash Cache

panels.description: Percent of reads on node that are supplied from FlashPool SSD layer.
panels.title: Reads from Flash Pool

panels.description: Percent of reads on node that are supplied from, and had to wait on, HDD.
panels.title: Reads from HDD

panels.description: Percent of reads on node that are supplied from, and had to wait on, SSD.
panels.title: Reads from SSD

panels.description: Percent of reads on node that are supplied from, and had to wait on, FabricPool.
panels.title: Reads from FabricPool

panels.description: Total requests (all operation types) per second to object storage
panels.title: Object Storage Requests per Second

panels.description: Throughput of GET requests to object storage
panels.title: Object Storage GET Throughput

panels.description: Throughput of PUT requests to object storage
panels.title: Object Storage PUT Throughput

panels.description:
scan_latency: Latency by the scanner after it pulls the request and until it responds, including scan time of the AV software.

Note, the scan latency is per request (file) and not per IOP!
panels.title: Top SVM Virus Scan Latency

panels.description:
scan_noti_received_rate: Number of virus scan responses received per second.

Note, the scan rate is per request (file) and not per IOP!
panels.title: Top SVM Virus Scan Requests

panels.description:
dispatch_latency is latency by ONTAP to select a scanner and until the selected scanner pulls the request.

Note, the scan latency is per request (file) and not per IOP!
panels.title: Top SVM Virus Scan Dispatch Latency

panels.description:
scan_latency: Latency by the scanner after it pulls the request and until it responds, including scan time of the AV software.

Note, the scan latency is per request (file) and not per IOP!
panels.title: Top AV Server Scan Latency

panels.description:
scan_dispatch_request_rate: Number of virus scan requested per second.

Note, the scan rate is per request (file) and not per IOP!
panels.title: Top AV Server Scan Requests

panels.description: scanner_stats_pct_cpu_used: CPU utilization of the virus scan server
panels.title: Top AV Server CPU Busy

panels.description: scanner_stats_pct_mem_used: Memory utilization of the virus scan server
panels.title: Top AV Server Memory Used

panels.description: scanner_stats_pct_network_used: Busiest network link utilization of the virus scan server
panels.title: Top AV Server Network Utilization
